Name: Legend of Krannia: Cursed Fate
About the game: Legend of Krannia is a Top-down Fantasy Medieval 2d Action Deckbuilding Game. Collect skills, Level up, Customize your Gameplay and Manage your stats. It has a Complex 2d Controls with skill switching, blocking and dodging. Tons of Skills you can use to match your game strategy! Game Features Topdown 2d action Deckbuilding game Complex 2d Controls with skill switching, blocking and dodging (with cancellations!) Equip Skills, and Manage your stats Collect skill, level up, customize your gameplay Beautiful Levels Unique and Interesting Bosses Wacky Stories, Names Community involvement and feedback from the players will be vital to the development process of Legend of Krannia. Join us! AEthernum Discord
